thread.section_title: SecureDataRecovery.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecureDataRecovery.ca | securedatarecovery.ca
thread.title: Bonnie Burkman

author: Bonnie Burkman
title: Bonnie Burkman
text: Secure Data is a great company to work with! The people were very professional and provided a great service! They were extremely accommodating and willing to work with me when I had a hard limit on how much I could afford to pay for the recovery. They recovered my data without any hassles to another HD I provided and then shipped it cleanly and quickly to my home!
